entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then light after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 30%
